addon.name: Example
addon.author: Iryoku
addon.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis dolor est, tristique vitae lacinia quis, vulputate sit amet mi. Duis lacinia, massa at faucibus sagittis.

addon.name: AEcho
addon.description: Automatically uses echo drops when you get silenced. Also, uses send to send a message to an alt that you got debuffed.
addon.author: Nitrous (Shiva)

addon.name: AnnounceTarget
addon.author: JoshK6656, Sechs
addon.description: Creates special manual or automatic chat messages conveying advanced information about some specific targets

addon.name: AnsweringMachine
addon.author: Byrth
addon.description: Stores tells that you receive for later recall.

addon.name: AutoControl
addon.description: Automated automaton equipment setting and burden tracker.
addon.author: Nitrous (Shiva)

addon.name: autoinvite
addon.author: r3g1stry
addon.description: Automatically invites players when sent a tell with a specified keyword.

addon.name: AutoJoin
addon.author: Arcon
addon.description: Automatically joins or declines party invites. Configurable with blacklist/whitelist mode and auto-decline settings.

addon.name: AutoRA
addon.author: Banggugyangu
addon.description: Causes Ranged Attacks to behave the same as melee Auto-Attack.

addon.name: AzureSets
addon.description: Automated blue magic spell setting.
addon.author: Nitrous (Shiva)

addon.name: BarFiller
addon.description: Displays an experience bar above the Help Window.
addon.author: Morath

addon.name: BattleMod
addon.author: Byrth
addon.description: Customizes battle chat messages.

addon.name: Blist
addon.author: Ikonic
addon.description: More detailed blist with tiered display options. Allows for blist to be active on any or all of several chat types.

addon.name: bluGuide
addon.author: Anissa
addon.description: Change your blue magic on the fly with this clickable menu. Sort your spells by traits, buffs, procs, and more.

addon.name: boxdestroyer
addon.author: Seth VanHeulen (Acacia@Odin)
addon.description: Tracks and displays info about possible combinations for treasure caskets.

addon.name: Cancel
addon.author: Byrth
addon.description: Mimics the cancel plugin, but also accepts buff names instead of just IDs.

addon.name: cBlock
addon.description: Blacklist addon for FFOChat.
addon.author: Nitrous (Shiva)

addon.name: CellHelp
addon.author: Krizz and Balloon
addon.description: Tracks cells that are needed, displays your position in the lot order, and creates the appropriate LL profiles.

addon.name: chars
addon.author: Giuliano Riccio (Zohno@Phoenix - R.I.P)
addon.description: Lets you input special chars using simple tags (ex.: <note> for â™ª).

addon.name: ChatLink
addon.author: Arcon
addon.description: Allows opening links posted into the FFXI chat.

addon.name: ChatPorter
addon.author: Ikonic
addon.description: Displays tell, party, and linkshell chat to alternate character and optional textbox. Also, allows you to reply from either character.

addon.name: Clock
addon.author: Arcon
addon.description: Displays an on-screen clock in a custom format with options to display several different time zones.

addon.name: ConsoleBG
addon.author: Arcon
addon.description: Displays a dark (by default) background behind the Windower console to make it more readable.

addon.name: digger
addon.author: Seth VanHeulen (Acacia@Odin)
addon.description: Displays Chocobo digging accuracy, fatigue and remaining greens after each dig. Also shows dig "recast" timer using the Timers plugin.

addon.name: Distance
addon.author: Arcon
addon.description: Shows the distance to your current target.

addon.name: DistancePlus
addon.author: Sammeh
addon.description: Replacement for Distance Addon to show distance to current target and distance from pet. Also color coordinates distance based on job and abilities, such as magic, ranged attacks, and JA's. Also shows height differential for fights requiring height delta to avoid AOE.

addon.name: DressUp
addon.author: Cair
addon.description: Emulates BlinkMeNot functionality. Allows for customization of gear display for you or anyone else.

addon.name: DynamisHelper
addon.description: Displays a timer when a mob is procced, tracks currency obtained, and can create a LL to lot all currency.

addon.name: Enemybar
addon.author: mmckee
addon.description: This is an addon for Windower4 for FFXI. It creates a big health bar for the target to make it easy to see.

addon.author: Giuliano Riccio (Zohno@Phoenix - R.I.P)
addon.name: enternity
addon.description: Enters "Enter" automatically when prompted during a cutscene or when talking to NPCs. It will not skip choice dialog boxes.

addon.name: eval
addon.author: Aureus
addon.description: Allows developers to run arbitrary lua code in the console.

addon.name: FastCS
addon.author: Cair
addon.description: Dramatically speeds up cutscenes by disabling the frame rate cap. Requires the config plugin.

addon.name: FFOColor
addon.author: Nitrous (Shiva)
addon.description: Allows you to show FFOChat text in one of the 5 game chat channels. As well as specify colors for the text

addon.name: findAll
addon.author: Giuliano Riccio (Zohno@Phoenix - R.I.P)
addon.description: Searches items stored on all your characters and allows live on-screen tracking of specified items.

addon.name: Gametime
addon.author: Omnys@Valefor
addon.description: Displays game time, game-week, moon information, and travel times.

addon.name: GearSwap
addon.author: Byrth
addon.description: Changes gear in response to player actions. [[Uses Packets.]]

addon.name: Highlight
addon.description: Highlights party members names when mentioned in the chatlog.
addon.author: Balloon

addon.name: instaLS
addon.author: Byrth
addon.description: Enables instant linkshell chat after zoning.

addon.name: InfoReplacer
addon.author: Cair
addon.description: Replaces outgoing text prefixed by % with respective game information.

addon.name: Itemizer
addon.author: Ihina
addon.description: Use commands to move items and gear between bags.

addon.name: JobChange
addon.author: Sammeh
addon.description: Command line Job Changer

addon.name: latentchecker
addon.author: byrth,smd111
addon.description: Checks weapon skill points of weapon skill trial weapons and mythic weapons

addon.name: Linker
addon.author: Arcon
addon.description: Allows opening links to certain websites from within the game, with an optional search parameter.

addon.name: Logger
addon.author: Arcon
addon.description: Logs the chat log to a file.

addon.name: Lottery
addon.author: Arcon
addon.description: Automatically passes an item on all accounts if lotted by another.

addon.name: MacroChanger
addon.author: Banggugyangu
addon.description: Automatically switches Macro Book and Page according to job changes.

addon.name: MobCompass
addon.description: A compass to show your position relative to the target (not players) for geo and has a setup for Sneak attack

addon.name: Nostrum
addon.description: Creates a click-able on-screen macro to help avoid targeting problems while curing.
addon.author: trv

addon.name: obiaway
addon.description: Automatically collect and remove elemental obi based on day/weather/storm conditions.

addon.name: Omen
addon.author: Braden, Sechs
addon.description: Tracks primary and secondary objectives within the Omen event in a customizable on-screen window

addon.name: OhShi
addon.description: Keeps track of various event related things. Such as, VW proc messages, mob casting, mob tp moves, TH procs and cor rolls, as well as others.
addon.author: Nitrous (Shiva)

addon.name: Organizer
addon.description: A multi-purpose inventory management solution. Similar to GearCollector.
addon.author: Byrth, Rooks

addon.name: pet_fix
addon.author: Byrth
addon.description: Temporary addon that fixes a null pointer animation error with pets that is causing crashes.

addon.name: PetSchool
addon.author: Banggugyangu
addon.description: A helper addon for PUPs using spellcast, it informs spellcast of pet casting (healing or nuking).

addon.name: PetTP
addon.author: SnickySnacks
addon.description: Tracks pet vitals (HP/TP/MP)

addon.name: plasmon
addon.author: Giuliano Riccio (Zohno@Phoenix - R.I.P)
addon.description: tracks plasm, killed mobs and dropped airlixirs during a delve.

addon.name: plugin_manager
addon.author: Byrth
addon.description: Allows you to specify which plugins and addons will be used with which characters.

addon.name: PointWatch
addon.author: Byrth
addon.description: Allows you to monitor your XP/CP gains and keep track of the Dynamis time limit.

addon.name: porter
addon.author: Giuliano Riccio (Zohno@Phoenix - R.I.P)
addon.description: Shows the slips' items highlighting those that are stored.

addon.name: Pouches
addon.author: Omnys@Valefor
addon.description: Simple addon to use all of a named item in player's main inventory, like //pouches bead pouch.

addon.name: RAWR
addon.author: Genoxd
addon.description: Plays a sound effect when your unity leader says something about dragons spawning.

addon.name: reive
addon.author: Giuliano Riccio (Zohno@Phoenix - R.I.P)
addon.description: Tracks exp, bayld, momentum scores and bonuses during a reive.

addon.name: Remember
addon.author: Byrth
addon.description: Should request spawn packets for players / mobile NPCs that failed to spawn.

addon.name: Respond
addon.author: Byrth
addon.description: Respond to tells and FFOchat PMs using //r.

addon.name: Rhombus
addon.description: Creates a highly customizable, click-able, on-screen menu.
addon.author: trv

addon.name: ROE
addon.author: Cair
addon.description: Lets you save your Records of Eminence objectives to profiles for easily swapping out objectives.

addon.name: RollTracker
addon.author: Balloon
addon.description: Simplifies Cor rolls, tells you the bonus they give, stops you from doubling up on lucky rolls and reports your chance to bust.

addon.name: salvage2
addon.author: Krizz
addon.description: Displays pathos that have not been removed in Salvage 2. Displays zone timer.

addon.name: SATACast
addon.author: Banggugyangu
addon.description: Informs Spellcast about changes to Sneak Attack and Trick Attack status.

addon.name: Scoreboard
addon.author: Suji
addon.description: Basic in-game damage parser. It displays live DPS and works even when chat filters are enabled.

addon.name: setbgm
addon.author: Seth VanHeulen (Acacia@Odin)
addon.description: Set your background/battle/other music to any music in the game.

addon.name: Shortcuts
addon.author: Byrth
addon.description: Applys spellcast-like command completion (interpretation and target completion) to commands. Includes emotes, /check, and /pcmd.

addon.name: Silence
addon.author: Ihina
addon.description: Eliminates the flood of equipment change messages.

addon.name: ShoutHelper
addon.author: Jandel
addon.description: Help managing party job in an alliance shout. Displays a in-game editable list (initially empty) in which one can set job and players

addon.name: Send
addon.author: Byrth
addon.description: Sends commands between windower instances using IPC.

addon.name: SpeedChecker
addon.author: Arcon
addon.description: Displays a small box indicating your current movement speed modifier (+/- X%).

addon.name: SpellCheck
addon.author: Damien Dennehy (Zubis@Asura)
addon.description: This addon lists spells you haven't unlocked yet.

addon.name: StaggerTrack
addon.author: Nitrous (Shiva)
addon.description: Catches voidwatch weakness messages and prints them to a textbox in case you miss them in the battle spam.

addon.name: STNA
addon.author: Nitrous (Shiva)
addon.description: One-button status removal for dual boxing.

addon.name: stopwatch
addon.author: Patrick Finnigan (Puhfyn@Ragnarok)
addon.description: Timer that counts up and allows you to track time since events e.g. spawns.

addon.name: StratHelper
addon.author: Ihm
addon.description: A simple helper addon for Spellcast for Scholar Stratagems. It will automatically calculate the number of stratagems you have and push them into spellcast variables.

addon.name: subTarget
addon.author: Sebyg666
addon.description: Enhances the usage of the send addon by allowing a stal or stpc or st target to be sent as the spell recipient. This removes the need for multiple macros for the same spell.

addon.name: TargetInfo
addon.author: Arcon
addon.description: Displays information about your current target in memory.

addon.name: Text
addon.author: Arcon
addon.description: Allows creating and manipulating on-screen text objects through Windower commands.

addon.name: Treasury
addon.author: Arcon
addon.description: Lots or passes items based on configurable lists, drops unwanted items from the inventory and automatically stacks items when they drop.

addon.name: thtracker
addon.author: Krizz
addon.description: Displays latest TH level from chat.

addon.name: timestamp
addon.author: Giuliano Riccio (Zohno@Phoenix - R.I.P)
addon.description: Prefixes any chat message with a timestamp. Based on Timestamp plugin.

addon.name: TParty
addon.author: Arcon
addon.description: Shows a target's HP percentage next to their health bar as well as party/alliance members's TP.

addon.name: translate
addon.author: Byrth
addon.description: Gives a rough JP->EN translation using the resources and custom dictionaries.

addon.name: TreasurePool
addon.author: Kenshi
addon.description: Replacement for the Treasure Pool thats shows time till the item auto drop and who is the current winning lot.

addon.name: Update
addon.author: Arcon
addon.description: Updates and reloads all plugins and addons when typing //update.

addon.name: VisibleFavor
addon.author: Seth VanHeulen (Acacia@Odin)
addon.description: Displays a GEO bubble around your avatar to visualize Favor/Ward ranges.

addon.name: vwhl
addon.author: Giuliano Riccio (Zohno@Phoenix - R.I.P)
addon.description: Redirects the nm's weaknesses (VW or Abyssea) to the "tell" stream so that they can be held using the chat filters' function and highlights the important info.

addon.name: XIVBar
addon.author: SirEdeonX (Edeon@Asura)
addon.description: Displays HP, MP and TP bars on the center of the screen, akin to FFXIV, for easy tracking

addon.name: Yush
addon.author: Arcon
addon.description: A file-based macro engine

addon.name: zonetimer
addon.author: Ihina
addon.description: Displays the amount of time one has been in zone. Original by Krellion.

addon.name: temps
addon.author: Mojo
addon.description: Makes buying temporary items from escha npcs much easier.

addon.name: CapeTrader
addon.author: Lygre, Burntwaffle
addon.description: Automates the ambuscade cape augmentation process.

addon.name: craft
addon.author: Mojo
addon.description: A Final Fantasy XI Crafting Addon
